channel.title: CockTales: Dirty Discussions
channel.description: CockTales: Dirty Discussions is hosted by Kiki Said So and Medinah Monroe. Both women are in different stages of their love lives; one single and one in a serious long term relationship. The women give uncensored accounts about their sex and dating lives, relationships, and what it's really like to navigate the sea of love in Atlanta. On CockTales, the ladies gather over great drinks and discuss the latest happenings in their sexual experiences dating lives.
channel.copyright: Copyright Kiki Said So & Medinah Monroe

item.title: Ep. 266 "Don't Touch My Leftovers!"
item.description:
What's the protocol for dealing with your "friend's" leftovers?

Cocktail Recipe:
Cocktail: Thanksgiving Bae

1 bottle (64 ounces) cranberry juice
1 bottle (2 liters) Squirt
2 can (46 ounce each) pineapple juice
1 bottle (750 mL) tequila silver

Instructions:
To a large punch bowl, add the cranberry juice, pineapple juice, tequila and Squirt. Stir to combine.
Add large ice cubes to chill. Garnish with fresh cranberries and lime slices.

item.title: Ep. 262 "Is Having An Orgasmless Relationship Really That Bad?"
item.description:
Cocktail: WITCH'S BREW

1 OUNCES OF MIDORI
1 OUNCES OF TRIP SEC
1 OUNCE OF FRESH LEMON JUICE
1 CUBE OF DRY ICE


Instructions:
Add the Midori, Cointreau, and lemon juice to a cocktail mixing glass (or cocktail shaker). Add 2 handfuls of regular ice cubes and stir until cold. Strain the drink into a lowball glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

Using tongs (do not touch the dry ice!), add a 1/2-inch to 1-inch chunk of dry ice to the glass, which will sink to the bottom and immediately make a smoking effect. The ice cube will disappear in about 5 minutes. Do not drink the dry ice! Wait until the cube disappears before enjoying your drink (or you can take sips with the dry ice in the bottom).

Follow Us!
@cocktalespodcast
@kikisaidso
@coffeebeandean

item.title: Ep.261 Hell Date ft. Juwan Mass with Kiki Said So & Medinah Monroe
item.description:
This week we're joined by Juwan Mass!

Cocktail: PARANORMAL POP THAT PUSSY

1 jigger apple brandy or apple vodka chilled

1 tsp grenadine

2 jiggers Blackberry Shimmery Liqueur chilled

Powdered dry ice optional

Martini glass to serve


Instructions:
Add about 1/2 - 1 tsp of powdered dry ice to the bottom of the glass (optional).
Place the apple brandy and purple shimmery liqueur in a shaker. Add 1 ice cube and shake for a few seconds to chill the drink. Strain the drink into a martini glass. Top up with more purple shimmery liqueur if necessary.
Pour 1 tsp of grenadine syrup, about an inch from the surface of the drink - the grenadine should sink to the bottom, creating a "bleeding" effect.

item.title: Feed Drop: Introducing Lovers & Friends with Shan Boodram
item.description:
There is so much great and life-changing information about sex and intimacy, but lets face it, it can be dry as hell! Intimacy expert and sexologist Shan Boodram takes a deep dive into anything and everything about sex, relationships, and the science of attachment every week with expert guests and friends who will tell all. Its everything The Talk should be.

Lovers and Friends is out now! Listen on Stitcher, Apple Podcasts, Pandora, or wherever you find your favorite podcasts.

item.title: Ep. 173 "Protect Yourself" ft. Nicole Roebuck of AID Atlanta
item.description:
This week Nicole Roebuck, Executive Director or AID Atlanta joins us to discuss safe sex, HIV prevention drugs, how to protect yourself when your partner is HIV positive and why HIV is so prevalent in the south, especially Atlanta...and it's not why you may think.

It's important to know your status. Visit www.aidatlanta.org if in the metro Atlanta area or search for Ryan White projects near you. Many places offer FREE testing and FREE Transportation. HIV no longer carries the "death sentence" it used to. You can live a long healthy life IF and only if you know your status.

visit www.nativedeodorant.com and use promo code COCKTALES for 20% off your first purchase

item.description:
This week Medinah's mom Miss Gina and her cousin Connie join us to drop some wisdom on us. Ladies stop "playing house" demand what you want! That's just one piece of advice, but there's so many gems in this one! They schooled us on shacking up with men and playing the role of a wife with out actually being one. Listen as these seasoned ladies join us to break down the differences of dating then and now.

item.title: Ep. 19 No Girlfriends Allowed ft. Marcia Alene
item.description:
No Girlfriends Allowed!!! This week, the ladies invite author of "No Girlfriends Allowed" Marcia Alene to enjoy a nice cocktail and have a little girl talk about how no one really has a concrete answer on what a girlfriend is and why we're all trying to be one. What's the point? What are the rules? Is this really the right fit for me? Hmmm...take a listen as we discuss this, celibacy, struggling with celibacy, and how to cut him off!

Get your copy of Marcia Alene's book "No Girlfriends Allowed" at www.NoGirlfriendsAllowed.com

Join us along with Atlanta Mission to raise money and awareness for Atlanta's homeless. Visit race.atlantamission.org to join our team CockTales Podcast or to make a donation.

Visit Josephine Lounge on Buford Hwy in Atlanta for The R&B edition of One Love One Mic. Tickets are $10, contact @onelove1mic for tickets.

Be sure to follow us at

@cocktalespodcast
@KikiSaidSo
@coffeebeandean
@TVHost4You
and our guest @nogirlfriendsallowed

Subscribe, Rate and Review!

Join us along with Atlanta Mission to raise money and awareness for Atlanta's homeless. Visit race.atlantamission.org to join our team CockTales Podcast or to make a donation.

Visit Josephine Lounge on Buford Hwy in Atlanta for The R&B edition of One Love One Mic. Tickets are $10, contact @onelove1mic for tickets.

Be sure to follow us at

@cocktalespodcast
@KikiSaidSo
@coffeebeandean
@TVHost4You
and our guest @nogirlfriendsallowed

Subscribe, Rate and Review!

item.title: Ep. 16 CockTales 2.0 "New Year New Me!"
item.description:
Happy New Year!!! We are so excited that we have some major changes!!!

1. No more bad sound...we're now recording at Means Street Studios in Atlanta, so we have a super crispy new sound!!

2. Everybody welcome Medinah @coffeebeandean and leave some cocktail emojis on her Instagram. She's officially part of the crew and we know you'll love her.

3. We also have some events coming this year, follow each of us as well as @cocktalespodcast (IG deleted our old page) to be the first to know about it.

Kiki- @KikiSaidSo
Medinah- @Coffeebeandean
Shayla- @TVHost4You

This week we talked about the best dates, Mariah Carey's awful performance, and what to do when your baby daddy gives your Herpes and you want to date new people. Yea. It gets real!

Send all listener questions to cocktales.atl@gmail.com

Download LYFT and use code: KIKIANDSHAYLA to score free ride credits

If you're in Atlanta, go to https://taglinesclothinglaunch.eventbrite.com for your tickets. Kiki will be hosting and there's tons of vendors, food, and drinks!
